message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $140. We believe this is a fair price considering its value and quality. Looking forward to your response.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I am willing to pay $130 for it.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your valuation of the product. In order to reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I would like to propose a price of $135 for the product.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am willing to pay $132 for the product.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. To facilitate a transaction, I am willing to accept $133 for the product.
